title: Hi-veg muffins
ingredients: ['100 g (3½ oz) squash or sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped', '100 g (3½ oz) courgettes, grated', '250 g (9 oz) onions, grated', '100 g (3½ oz) red pepper, finely diced', '100 g (3½ oz) spinach, shredded, or broccoli, finely chopped', '100 g (3½ oz) canned sweetcorn, drained', '75 ml (2½ fl oz) vegetable oil, plus extra for greasing', '225 g (8 oz) reduced-fat Cheddar cheese', 'Salt and black pepper', '225 g (8 oz) self-raising white flour, sifted', '4 eggs']
